title: Build executor
description: Transpiles TS files with SWC to specified JS module type, Generates rolluped .d.ts + api.md, transforms *.styles.* files via Babel(Griffel) and copies provided Assets.

sourceRoot.description: Directory where the source files are located (relative to {projectRoot}).

outputPathRoot.description: Root directory where all output assets will live. Relative to {workspaceRoot}

moduleOutput.description: Which JS module type to use to transpile to provided output.

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files (relative to {outputPathRoot})

generateApi.description: Generate rolluped 'd.ts' bundle including 'api.md' that provides project public API

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'

substitutions.description: Key-value pairs to replace in the output path
